title: [Large-Scale] Indonesian History and Culture Experiential Learning Using Student Broadcasting: Language-Media Integrated Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic historical learning experience, digital device proficiency, and foundational media production and grammar comprehension
context.additional_context: BYOD-enabled collaborative microlearning program focusing on practical media literacy and expressive skills via journalism production training.

learning_goals: Analyze and comprehensively explain ≥5 major historical events and cultural characteristics of Indonesia using textual and visual materials.

Apply the student broadcasting production process (planning–shooting–editing) to create a video introducing Indonesian culture, effectively conveying learning content through news reporting and presentation skills.
Utilize video editing techniques and media literacy during production to create content reflecting Indonesia’s linguistic and cultural characteristics.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
